comment: This file describe the different Epitaph Road Sections/Paths.
The systems for 3.0/3.1 is a bit different than the 3.2/3.3 content
The 3.0 and 3.1 dungeons have generic barriers that are removed by
spending a small amount of souls. In 3.2 and 3.3, unlocking a new
Individual trials are described in the epitaph directory
